mapper.insert:
insert into zy-community.zy_owner_room(community_id, building_id, unit_id, room_id, owner_id, owner_type, room_status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.communityId}, #{entity.buildingId}, #{entity.unitId}, #{entity.roomId}, #{entity.ownerId}, #{entity.ownerType}, #{entity.roomStatus}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})

insert into zy-community.zy_owner_room(community_id, building_id, unit_id, room_id, owner_id, owner_type, room_status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.communityId}, #{entity.buildingId}, #{entity.unitId}, #{entity.roomId}, #{entity.ownerId}, #{entity.ownerType}, #{entity.roomStatus}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update community_id = values(community_id) , building_id = values(building_id) , unit_id = values(unit_id) , room_id = values(room_id) , owner_id = values(owner_id) , owner_type = values(owner_type) , room_status = values(room_status) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_time = values(update_time) , remark = values(remark)
